title.narrative: English as a Foreign Language Programme: developing English and methodological skills for teachers to support better English language skills in Brazil

description.narrative: The project aims to provide an integrated approach to English as a Foreign Language (EFL) teacher training programme in public schools in 5 Brazilian State Governments (São Paulo, Minas Gerais, Mato Grosso, Paraíba and Tocantis). This project will not only enhance the English proficiency of the public school teachers involved but also leverage the UK's global expertise in education to demonstrate that investment in EFL is an essential public policy for the country's development.
